pages.text: At the deepest parts of the Deeper Down, this stone was waiting for you. Visually, it reminds you a bit of $(thing)Preservation Stone$().$(br2)$(italic)Bedrock 2: Electroc Boogaloo
Looks like whoever came before you used giant machines for harvesting this stone. The same building the $(thing)Preservation Structures$() in the Overworld?
